name: TakeWING Aviation
about: TakeWING Aviation, located in Creswell, Oregon, is a leading Cessna Pilot Center and aviation club serving Eugene, Springfield, and Lane County. As a for-profit aviation club, we have a diverse membership of about 24 individuals, including pilots, student pilots, and aircraft owners who are also business owners. We offer a comprehensive range of flight training programs, including Private Pilot Certificate, Commercial Pilot Certificate, Flight Instructor certification, Instrument Rating, and Tail Wheel Pilot Training. Our commitment to excellence and safety makes us a premier choice for those aspiring to take to the skies. Whether you're pursuing a career in aviation or flying for recreation, TakeWING Aviation provides the expertise and resources to help you achieve your goals.
services:
["Computerized Testing
Ground School
Flight Instructor CFI
Private Pilot
Recreational Pilot
Sport Pilot"]
